model.agent.humanAgent.aatom.tacticalLevel.navigation

Class NavigationModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.agent.humanAgent.aatom.tacticalLevel.navigation.NavigationModule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Updatable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    OperatorNavigationModule, PassengerNavigationModule

    public class NavigationModule
extends java.lang.Object
implements Updatable
    The goal activity is responsible for the goal setting of the agent. It determines if the agent is stuck, and updates itself accordingly. It also allows for external parties to influence the goals, using the 'set' methods.
    Author:
    S.A.M. Janssen

      • isStuck

        public boolean isStuck(double secondsStuck)
        Determines if the agent is stuck for a given number of seconds. Stuck is defined as moving at most 0.2m in secondsStuck seconds.
        Parameters:
        secondsStuck - The number of seconds it takes before an agent is considered stuck.
        Returns:
        True if the agent is stuck, false otherwise.
